author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR backports https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42742 in order to allow a file written in 14_1_X to be read by a 13_2_X cmsRun as requested in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/48481.

The last commit was needed to get the backport to compile, because of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43898 was in 13_2_X already before the backport.

Note that files written with a release containing this PR will be unreadable by earlier 13_2_X releases. Therefore this PR is to be merged only in the 13_2_HLT_X branch.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1480

#### PR validation:

I modified the `test_MC_PbPb_23_setup` test, added in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48503, to use my local CMSSW_13_2_HLT_X_2025-07-20-0000 + this PR developer area and to fail if the HLT step fails, and the test passed.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/42742
title: [13_2_HLT_X] Improve memory usage in ParameterSet
